apple_vendor_description: The kiss emoji between a woman and a man on Apple devices is a tender depiction, showcasing a woman with a medium-light skin tone and a man with a dark skin tone leaning in for a kiss, their features softened with Appleâ€™s signature glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients. A delicate red heart hovers between them, glowing with realistic light, symbolizing romance and affection with an intimate, rounded aesthetic. On Apple devices, this emoji is used to express love, passion, and romantic connection in a warm and visually appealing way.
